name: Untitled Labyrinth Hunt
description:
Arrow keys - Move

Space bar - Confirm move

Escape - Cancel move

Shift - Rotate barriers

You and three rivals are stuck in a deadly labyrinth!

Avoid the beast within and find the treasure before them!

Roll the dice to move around - Control the movement of the beast, or move the walls around to confound our rivals.

WIP

It's probably super easy to soft-lock the game, or make another player unable to move, so until I fix those... please don't?
